column3: Should be tagged with "Backport 0.12.2" if this is meant for segwit.\n
@MarcoFalke Agreed, thanks for pointing that out.\n

Makes sense to me. `mapAlreadyAskedFor`, although the generic name could mislead, is only used for transactions, not blocks, so there is no reason to have anything but the txid in the key at all.\nutACK 7e91f63\n
Backported as part of #7938. Removing label 'Needs backport'.\n
